Wairarapa boy racer incident: Violent attack sparked after driver’s car hit spectator, says bystander https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/wairapa-boy-racer-incident-violent-attack-sparked-after-drivers-car-hit-spectator-says-bystander/PI2P52XP6JDZNCH7JMQESK4HDQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/wairapa-boy-racer-incident-violent-attack-sparked-after-drivers-car-hit-spectator-says-bystander/PI2P52XP6JDZNCH7JMQESK4HDQ/ Katie OliverThe man said it's a select few who ruin boy racing events for everyone else. Sun, 27 Oct 2024 05:41:42 +0000 The driver of this silver car was assaulted and the vehicle smashed up when a boy racer event in Masterton last night turned violent. Photo / Supplied
Semisie Pomale avoids conviction, three years after Auckland MMA fighter Fau Vake’s ‘coward punch’ death https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/semisie-pomale-avoids-conviction-third-years-after-auckland-mma-fighter-fau-vakes-coward-punch-death/CFKXXNUENRDLRAVG6QL4R6EU64/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/semisie-pomale-avoids-conviction-third-years-after-auckland-mma-fighter-fau-vakes-coward-punch-death/CFKXXNUENRDLRAVG6QL4R6EU64/ Craig KapitanSemisie Pomale was granted a discharge without conviction, in part because of his new job. Sun, 27 Oct 2024 05:27:52 +0000 Semisie Pomale, one of four men who participated in an Auckland Central scuffle that resulted in the death of MMA fighter Fau Vake, leaves Auckland District Court in June 2021. He's pleaded guilty to common assault. Photo / Dean Purcell
Labour MP Ginny Andersen apologises after resharing King Charles, Christopher Luxon quip on Instagram https://www.nzherald.co.nz/lifestyle/labour-mp-ginny-andersen-reshares-king-charles-christopher-luxon-quip-on-instagram/JJODWEBI6RABFF65SXSTU3GZLE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/lifestyle/labour-mp-ginny-andersen-reshares-king-charles-christopher-luxon-quip-on-instagram/JJODWEBI6RABFF65SXSTU3GZLE/ Tom Rose"I shouldn't have shared it. I regret doing so and apologise for any offence caused." Sun, 27 Oct 2024 04:34:25 +0000 Labour MP Ginny Andersen reshared a post which made an explicit reference with regard to an outfit King Charles wore at the Commonwealth Heads of Government Meeting in Samoa. Photos / Mark Mitchell, @christopherluxon
Onehunga bus homicide: Victim Bernice Marychurch knew her alleged killer, police say https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/onehunga-bus-homicide-victim-bernice-marychurch-knew-her-alleged-killer-police-say/JUDXZ2KZHRF4NMV4QPA3MTHR6Y/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/onehunga-bus-homicide-victim-bernice-marychurch-knew-her-alleged-killer-police-say/JUDXZ2KZHRF4NMV4QPA3MTHR6Y/ Raphael FranksCCTV shows pair together earlier in the day. Sun, 27 Oct 2024 03:15:10 +0000 Bernice Marychurch has been identified on social media as the victim of Wednesday's Onehunga bus stabbing.
Whangārei pūkeko’s 29km trek home to bird recovery centre https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/whangarei-pukekos-29km-trek-home-to-bird-recovery-centre/NZMCG4OMHZFLVMQJBZE4XJE5NI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/whangarei-pukekos-29km-trek-home-to-bird-recovery-centre/NZMCG4OMHZFLVMQJBZE4XJE5NI/ Sarah CurtisWhen it comes to finding their way around, pukeko rival homing pigeons Sun, 27 Oct 2024 03:00:00 +0000 Rascal (pictured here) impressed Whangārei Bird Recovery Centre staff member Wendy Owen and others there who raised him from a chick, by finding his way back to them from 29kms away. Photo / S Curtis
Steamers ‘did us proud’ despite NPC loss to Wellington https://www.nzherald.co.nz/sunlive/news/steamers-did-us-proud-despite-npc-loss-to-wellington/KIZQSQL765EC3KUBRPDVH6OUB4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/sunlive/news/steamers-did-us-proud-despite-npc-loss-to-wellington/KIZQSQL765EC3KUBRPDVH6OUB4/ Rosalie Liddle CrawfordClose, but so far away after the Steamers push the Lions to extra time in the NPC final.
